医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
ZIP7：治疗与错误折叠蛋白相关的退行性疾病的新靶点蛋白质是生命的主力。生物体将它们用作构建模块、受体、处理器、信使和催化剂。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240430/ZIP7-A-novel-target-for-treating-dogenic-diseases-linked-with-misfolded- Proteins.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240430/ZIP7-A-novel-target-for-treating-dogenic-diseases-linked-with-misfolded- Proteins.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3fa5b406-4cfc-41ae-8431-ab6ce7eab1e0 Tue, 30 Apr 2024 15:37:22 -0400 ZIP7: A novel target for treating degenerative diseases associated with misfolded proteins
破译 Th2 多能祖细胞在慢性过敏性炎症中的作用目前，大多数过敏性疾病的治疗都需要终身治疗。过敏反应的特征是慢性抗原暴露引起的持续（2 型）炎症，是人类许多慢性疾病的基础，包括哮喘、特应性皮炎、溃疡性结肠炎等。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240430/Deciphering-the-role-of-Th2-multipot-progenitor-cells-in-chronic-allergic-inflammation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240430/Deciphering-the-role-of-Th2-multipot-progenitor-cells-in-chronic-allergic-inflammation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a8ba5636-e11a-457c-aad3-28ae6325967b Tue, 30 Apr 2024 15:29:35 -0400 Deciphering the role of Th2-multipotent progenitor cells in chronic allergic inflammation
吸烟者细微 CT 异常的进展可预测急性呼吸道疾病根据今天发表在北美放射学会杂志《放射学》上的一项新研究，如果吸烟者的 CT 扫描出现微小异常，并且随着时间的推移而出现异常，那么他们患急性呼吸道疾病的可能性就更大。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240430/Progression-of-subtle-CT-abnormalities-in-smokers-predicts-acute-respiratory-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240430/Progression-of-subtle-CT-abnormalities-in-smokers-predicts-acute-respiratory-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=84c64724-175f-42d5-88db-5d7d4ad5cd79 Tue, 30 Apr 2024 15:22:24 -0400 Progression of subtle CT abnormalities in smokers predicts acute respiratory disease
花生四烯酸水平较高的遗传倾向与较低的双相情感障碍风险相关根据《生物学》杂志上的一项新研究，含有花生四烯酸（一种存在于鸡蛋、家禽和海鲜中的 omega-6 多不饱和脂肪酸）的脂质循环水平较高的遗传倾向已被发现与较低的双相情感障碍风险相关。精神病学，由爱思唯尔出版。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240430/Genetic-propensity-to-higher-arachidonic-acid-levels-linked-to-lower-bipolar-disorder-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240430/Genetic-propensity-to-higher-arachidonic-acid-levels-linked-to-lower-bipolar-disorder-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fda4bd2f-2303-4a9b-94a8-51e9c354a1d5 Tue, 30 Apr 2024 15:15:39 -0400 Genetic propensity to higher arachidonic acid levels linked to lower bipolar disorder risk
一条胳膊和一条腿：黑客当联合健康集团 (UnitedHealth Group) 的子公司 Change Healthcare 今年冬天遭受网络攻击时，美国很大一部分医生、药剂师、医院和治疗师停止了领取工资。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240430/An-Arm-and-a-Leg-The-hack.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240430/An-Arm-and-a-Leg-The-hack.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=621e5fd0-1ff1-4fb6-8cbb-2ab5594d667e Tue, 30 Apr 2024 15:05:05 -0400 An Arm and a Leg: The hack
特定类别的药物可以逆转饮食引起的肥胖、脂肪肝和糖尿病卡罗林斯卡学院的研究人员可能已经找到了一种通过针对细胞动力源线粒体来治疗肥胖和相关疾病的新方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240430/Specific-class-of-drugs-can-reverse-diet-induced-obesity-fatty-liver-and-diabetes-in-mice.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240430/Specific-class-of-drugs-can-reverse-diet-induced-obesity-fatty-liver-and-diabetes-in-mice.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e829c8db-ab4d-41bb-a867-088314260969 Tue, 30 Apr 2024 10:59:45 -0400 Specific class of drugs can reverse diet-induced obesity, fatty liver and diabetes in mice
怀孕期间戒烟可防止胎盘与胎儿体重不匹配卑尔根大学和埃克塞特大学的一项新研究表明，戒烟的孕妇可以防止胎盘重量与胎儿生长之间的异常不匹配。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240430/Quitting-smoking-during-pregnancy-prevents-placental-fetal-weight-mismatch.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240430/Quitting-smoking-during-pregnancy-prevents-placental-fetal-weight-mismatch.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=50678853-1562-40b6-a165-03095a595807 Tue, 30 Apr 2024 10:29:23 -0400 Quitting smoking during pregnancy prevents placental-fetal weight mismatch
UNIGE 的合成抗凝剂提供肝素的可靠替代品抗凝治疗对于治疗心脏病、中风和静脉血栓等许多疾病至关重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240430/UNIGEs-synthetic-anticoagulant-provides-reliable-alternative-to-heparin.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240430/UNIGEs-synthetic-anticoagulant-provides-reliable-alternative-to-heparin.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6a975813-6aa2-48c1-b737-121f04f8632a Tue, 30 Apr 2024 08:07:15 -0400 UNIGE's synthetic anticoagulant provides reliable alternative to heparin
有毒气体加剧了孟菲斯西南部长期的污染多年来，罗丝·西姆斯（Rose Sims）都不知道佛罗里达街上一栋不起眼的砖砌建筑内发生了什么，该建筑距离她位于城镇西南侧的简陋单层住宅仅几英里。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240430/Toxic-gas-adds-to-a-long-history-of-pollution-in-Southwest-Memphis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240430/Toxic-gas-adds-to-a-long-history-of-pollution-in-Southwest-Memphis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4fabe710-84d6-4e33-856a-19cd806f0b40 Tue, 30 Apr 2024 07:00:35 -0400 Toxic gas adds to a long history of pollution in Southwest Memphis
在这里签名？财务协议可能会让医生占据主导地位卡斯·史密斯·柯林斯 (Cass Smith-Collins) 克服重重困难，接受了手术，使他的胸部与他的性别相匹配。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240430/Sign-here-Financial-agreements-may-leave-doctors-in-the-drivere28099s-seat.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240430/Sign-here-Financial-agreements-may-leave-doctors-in-the-drivere28099s-seat.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d0c40e2b-770c-4a5e-a0e1-b024a41e85f3 Tue, 30 Apr 2024 06:59:20 -0400 Sign here?
